General.Name: Kung Long Batteries Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Kung Long Batteries Industrial Co.,Ltd engages in the manufacture and sale of lead-acid batteries in Taiwan and internationally. It offers backup power, cyclic, high power, electric vehicle, long life telecom backup, green energy, and startup power batteries. The company provides its products for use in renewable energy storage systems, communication switches, telecommunications rooms, UPS power supplies, electric vehicles, and automobiles and motorcycles; and cycling high-power, deep-cycle, and solar energy applications. Kung Long Batteries Industrial Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Nantou City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 6, Tzu-Li 3rd Road, Nantou City, Taiwan, 54067
